trans-unit.source: Gets the section group information for the networking namespaces.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.NetSectionGroup"></xref> class.
This constructor does nothing.
Gets the configuration section containing the authentication modules registered for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<authenticationModules\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CauthenticationModules%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.AuthenticationModulesSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the connection management settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<connectionManagement\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CconnectionManagement%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the default Web proxy server settings for the local computer.
The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<defaultProxy\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CdefaultProxy%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Net" name="System.Net" href=""></xref> configuration section group from the specified configuration file.
Use this method to extract the network settings from a configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> that represents a configuration file.
A that represents the settings in config.
Gets the configuration section containing the SMTP client e-mail settings for the local computer.
The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<mailSettings\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CmailSettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the cache configuration settings for the local computer.
The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<requestCaching\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CrequestCaching%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the network settings for the local computer.
The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<settings\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3Csettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.SettingsSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the modules registered for use with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<webRequestModules\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CwebRequestModules%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModulesSection"></xref> object.
